solution_line_template: Malcolm has {instagram_followers} followers + {facebook_followers} followers = <<{instagram_followers}+{facebook_followers}={instagram_facebook_combined}>>{instagram_facebook_combined} followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has {instagram_facebook_combined} followers / {twitter_divisor} = <<{instagram_facebook_combined}/{twitter_divisor}={twitter_followers}>>{twitter_followers} followers on Twitter.
He has {twitter_followers} followers x {tiktok_multiplier} = <<{twitter_followers}*{tiktok_multiplier}={tiktok_followers}>>{tiktok_followers} followers on Tiktok.
He has {tiktok_followers} followers + {youtube_additional} followers = <<{tiktok_followers}+{youtube_additional}={youtube_followers}>>{youtube_followers} followers on Youtube.

Altogether, Malcolm has {instagram_facebook_combined} followers + {twitter_followers} followers + {tiktok_followers} followers + {youtube_followers} followers = <<{instagram_facebook_combined}+{twitter_followers}+{tiktok_followers}+{youtube_followers}={total_followers}>>{total_followers} followers on social media.
